American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. penchant for stirring up trouble. Like Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger , who will take the field Sunday earning a multi-million dollar paycheck. The accusations of sexual assault and his four game suspension a distant memory. He sat those games out. The Steelers survived those four games. And then he came back and it appears nobody remembers what he did, Mosher said. Memories of Michael Vick 's dog fighting conviction and jail time may be harder to shake, but the athlete was easily able to resume his lucrative NFL career after making a few amends.
